column4: hello, new Ubuntu user here... how do I tell where my app updates are coming from?  is there a preferred mirror to use?   also, same area.. the recommended security updates didn't complete (lost power) how do I restart that?  systems seems to be running fine, but I want all the latest updates applied.
to tell where the updates are coming from
thanks!  lots to learn here... am an old RH and SuSE user/admin...
